name: Alien Baby Adoption Agency
description:
Human babies are so 2019! 

Heck, everyone has one... 

Welcome to the Alien Baby Adoption Agency, the game where you can customize your own baby critter to bring back to Earth to love, and cherish; and eventually pay for their college tuition.

Warning : Not all babies grow up to become doctors, some just want to destroy the world!

-Created by Brandon Jamison-Frankola
